document.full_text: an explosion that killed 15 people in marrakesh was triggered by a remote control device, not a suicide bomber as previous reports suggested, france's interior minister said in an interview published on saturday.
document.title: marrakesh blast was remote-controlled bomb: france
lines_and_colors: an explosion that killed 15 people in marrakesh was triggered by a remote control device, not a suicide bomber as previous reports suggested, france's interior minister said in an interview published on saturday.
